subject: Automobile Racing
Computers and the Internet
Telephones and Telecommunications
Data Centers
lead_paragraph: In modern elite racing, the car is only the tip of a vast data iceberg, with information traveling from cars, trackside engineers and team bases sometimes a continent away.
